page.title: 17Attitudes.
page.content:
Continued from Page 16. 3. Have the changes been an improvement? If "Yes" -How? Road improvements reduced traffic. Untidy areas lanscaped. New village sewers. Salmon returned to R. Tyne. If "No" -Why? No doctor's surgery. No petrol pumps in village. Only village shop very busy. 4. What other changes would you like? Improved public transport. Stricter speed limits. Return of small shops. Return of doctor's surgery. Petrol pumps in village. Less traffic.
Half of those interviewed wished for no changes.
